text: Nabiyow ama korosuy Rabak lakal ugut yanim tangadde Qhiyaamah ayr√≥ sinni Rabbih foocal Solsimaanaah, A-ugut kee cisab cakki hinnaa? Yalli keenik iyya waqdi ken ablinnitoy uma caalat abaluk ten, yeey Ni-Rabbow usuk cakki kinnih iyyan, toysa addunyal koroositak sugteenimih sabbatah digaala tammoysa keenik iyya Yalli
